I joined the @ThePracticalDev  community a few hours ago. Seems like this is going to become a great year with many new learnings. Also this year it's time to give the community something back. Maybe you will find some @Cypress_io blog posts on my profile https://t.co/T32LDQPpsv

During our trip to Rome and also during the trip to Lake Garda we always had a very good mobile connection. And now we're traveling to Munich and lucky enough to have Edge or 3G. Good work in Germany!
